description:
The Syncfusion Navigation Drawer for Xamarin.Android is a simple component to create navigation pane in applications. It has a content area and a sliding pane that slides out from the edge of the page. The pane can be opened by swiping the edges of the screen or programmatically.

Key features:
• Pane positions: Position the pane in all four directions: left, right, top, and bottom.
• Animated transitions: Open/close pane based on transition SlideOnTop, push, and reveal.
• Changeable swipe sensitivity: Flexible to update touch threshold based on the device screen size

Note: This package needs to be installed in all Xamarin.Android project only.

Learn more: https://www.syncfusion.com/xamarin-android-ui-controls/navigation-drawer?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing

Documentation: https://help.syncfusion.com/xamarin-android/sfnavigationdrawer/getting-started?utm_source=nuget&utm_medium=listing
